code: import{types}from"../types/types";export var authReducer=function authReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.login:return{uid:action.payload.uid,name:action.payload.displayName};case types.logout:return{};default:return state;}};
